text: Ilkari Maru is a Central Australian Indigenous band from the 1980s. They played country rock music and sing in English and Pitjantjatjara. They released two albums through CAAMA Music, Ilkari Maru (1984)Music Australia Ilkari Maru and Lightning Strikes (Wangangarangk Rungkanu) (1987).Music Australia Lightning Strikes ==References== Category:Indigenous Australian musical groups Category:South Australian musical groups
title: Ilkari Maru
